docs.lead_paragraph: Kay Bailey Hutchison, the Texas State Treasurer and a Republican, was overwhelmingly elected to the United States Senate today after campaign in which she relentlessly focused on opposition to tax increases proposed by President Clinton. Mrs. Hutchison, a 49-year-old former state representative, easily defeated Bob Krueger, the Democrat who was appointed to the seat earlier this year by Gov. Ann W. Richards after Lloyd Bentsen resigned to become Treasury Secretary.
